participant_1.background:
I enjoy the food network and HGTV while I'm on my diet.
sometimes i volunteer at an urban farm.
I am an actor, but I am currently on a break from working and am enjoying my time with my family in a small mountain town.
I prefer comfortable, practical clothing that won't get in the way of my work.
I like to sit on my porch and watch the clouds go by.

participant_2.background:
I have a dog named Petrucci who always knows how to cheer me up when my inner critic is being too harsh.
i am a mother of two beautiful boys.
i only eat organic food.
I spend my days trying to learn more about the gambling business.
i still dream about going to paris and designing clothes.

content.text: Hi there! What do you like to do for fun?
Hello! I enjoy spending time with my family and dog.
That's nice! What kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever named Petrucci.
Oh, what a great name! I love golden retrievers.
He's the best dog. He always knows how to cheer me up when I'm down.
That's great! I'm glad you have him to support you.
Thanks! So, what do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy watching HGTV and the Food Network. I also like to volunteer at an urban farm.
Oh, that's cool! I love to cook. I only eat organic food.
Really? That's great! I love to cook too. I'm actually on a diet right now, so I'm watching a lot of food network to get ideas for healthy meals.
Oh, that's great! I'm sure you'll find some great recipes.
Thanks! I hope so.
So, what do you do for work?
I'm an actor, but I'm currently on a break from working. I'm enjoying spending time with my family and friends.
Oh, that's awesome! I bet you're a great actor.
Thanks! I try my best.
So, what do you like to do in your spare time?
I enjoy sitting on my porch and watching the clouds go by. It's so peaceful and relaxing.
That sounds really nice! I love to relax too.
So, what's your dream job?
I've always dreamed of designing clothes.
Oh, that's a great dream! I'm sure you'd be great at it.
Thanks! I hope so.
So, what do you like about your job?
I love working with my family and friends.
That's great! I'm glad you enjoy your job.
